scripts.mmd: mmdc -c mermaid-config.json -i src/diagrams/gitflow.mmd -o dist/diagrams/gitflow.svg && mmdc -c mermaid-config.json -i src/diagrams/trunk.mmd -o dist/diagrams/trunk.svg && mmdc -c mermaid-config.json -i src/diagrams/workflow-decision.mmd -o dist/diagrams/workflow-decision.svg
scripts.prepare: mkdir -p dist && cp -r fonts dist/ && cp -r styles dist/ && cp -r src/diagrams dist/ && cp pandoc.yaml dist/
scripts.html: npm run prepare && cd dist && pandoc ../src/README.md ../src/docs/WORKFLOW.md --defaults=pandoc.yaml -o ebook.html
scripts.build: npm run diag && npm run mmd && npm run html && npm run pdf
